full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Title: Pack and Harness Assy

The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series - Aviation Replacement Parts. 

**Reference Number:** cb-715-31309540

The solicitation number for this project is W8485-247824/B. 

A Competitive - Selective Tendering process will be used to select a supplier for this RFP.

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

The Acquisition requires the procurement of 15 items for the CT114, for the Department of National Defence, Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 5. 

This RFP is open only to Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

*   JHT Defense Inc.
*   Canada West Avionics
*   Simex Defence Inc.
*   Tower Aerospace Inc.
*   Unisource Technology Inc.
*   L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
*   Mattis Aerospace
*   M1 Composites Technology
*   Rockwell Collins Canada
*   Aero Precision Industries LLC

### Key Information:
##### Contract Details:
The expected contract start date and contract end date are both listed as "None".
##### Procurement Method:
The procurement method is listed as "Competitive - Selective Tendering"
##### Trade Agreements:
This tender matches the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information
Should you have any inquiries regarding this RFP, please contact:
Ryan Duncan
Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
455, Boulevard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC), J8Y 6V7
Phone: (613) 292-9650
Email: Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca

### Additional Information
A notice will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at least once a year to allow more suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

If you are interested in becoming a qualified supplier, please contact Jessica Lepinski, Supply Team Leader, Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada, at jessica.lepinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. Please note that the division is currently working remotely due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

### Related Documents
You can view the RFP and all supporting documents by visiting
